page.title: 13 The Journal and Gazette
page.content: The{Journal and Gazette}is the local paper of Linlithgow,Bo'ness and South Queensferry.It was established in 1879 and the editor is a{Mr.C.Mailer.}The {Journal & Gazette}is weekly and costs 18p.The people of Linlithowshire prefer news about the area and the people in it. The main news this year and last year has been the row over the car parking in the Regent centre,the ban on tourist buses at the cross because of traffic jams and the new rates revaluation. Mostly people write letters in about something they feel strongly about,for instance people parking their cars in the Regent Centre and shopping elsewhere.
